main event: On December 15, 1955, two large, steady green lights and five steady white lights were observed moving slowly while producing a large motor sound.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 25 minutes,The object was described as large and elliptical,The report considered various possible explanations including a balloon and an aircraft (B-36),There was high air traffic reported in the area at that time,The observation was part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings.
sighted object: two large steady green lights and five steady white lights
